main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified flying objects occurred in Akron and Ravenna, Ohio, in January 1963, with witnesses observing objects with colored lights that faded and changed colors.
interesting points: The first sighting lasted 20-25 minutes with two lights seen in the sky by people in Akron., A witness and his wife observed the same object separately, indicating multiple witnesses., The objects had dull yellow lights and a ring of bright lights surrounding them., One sighting involved a bright light that split into three parts and proceeded southward., Objects changed colors from yellow to red and white during observations.
sighted object: unidentified flying objects with colored lights
witness description: Witnesses included a man and his wife, along with additional observers in the area.
